text:
Ant's dependency checker displays "*.class is up to date"
How do I force a rebuild on all Java files???
Thank You,
creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
This is not a bug report.  Please ask questions on the ant-user list.
You have to implement the "rebuild all" functionality yourself, typically by 
simply removing the temporary build directory where everything compiles to.

creator: holtdl@yahoo.com
text:
Or actually more typically by removing all the .class files from the build 
directory (if all you want to do if a full recompile, not a full rebuid of 
everything). (Sorry for the added noise in a bogus "bug" report -- just wanted 
to clarify that.)
